title: Map of land grant and contract - pattern

content.prompt: Which of the following describes the final result of the policy depicted in the map?

choices.label: It was revoked by President Andrew Johnson and land was returned to former owners or sold to northern investors.
It allowed Southern prisons to hire out convicts to farm land newly granted to freedmen.
It was used by President Abraham Lincoln to free enslaved people in Confederate states along the Atlantic coast.
It gave African American men access to the right to vote and enabled formal participation in politics.

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
